name: Man_hit_with_bottle
text:
Man hit with bottle
A man was involved in an altercation with Monique's husband at the Roadhouse.
Biography
The man was apparently involved with Monique, a married woman. As they watched Audrey dance, Monique's husband threw a beer bottle at him, starting a fight. Disturbed, Audrey ran over to her husband Charlie and begged him to get her out of there.
